tooltips.password: Optional. If provided, a Chat / User will be created with these credentials so the agent can login to Chat immediately. Requirements: minimum 6 characters and at least 1 special character (!@#$%^&*()_+-=[]{}). If not provided, the agent will receive a confirmation email to set their password.
tooltips.chatwootAgentId: The agent ID in Chat. This field is automatically populated after sync.
tooltips.autoOffline: Whether the agent's availability status is configured to go offline automatically when away.
tooltips.isAI: Enable to configure this agent as an AI-powered agent.
tooltips.aiPrompt: The system prompt that defines the AI agent's behavior and capabilities.
tooltips.knowledgeBaseCategories: Select knowledge base categories. Articles in these categories (and their sub-categories) will be available for AI-powered responses.
tooltips.calendarsToManage: Select users whose calendars this AI agent can manage. The agent can check availability, create, update, and delete appointments for these calendars.
tooltips.confirmed: Whether the agent has confirmed their email address in Chat.
tooltips.chatwootUser: Link to the platform-level Chat / User if this agent corresponds to one.
tooltips.customRoleId: The custom role ID assigned to this agent in Chat, if any.
tooltips.assignedUser: The EspoCRM user who will access Chat as this agent. This enables Single Sign-On (SSO) for the assigned user. The user must be in the same team as the Chat / Account.
